item.title: Trump will abandon Ukraine peace talks ‘in days’ without progress, warns Rubio
item.description: US secretary of state’s warning came hours before JD Vance expressed optimism a breakthrough was close

item.title: US and Ukraine sign memorandum of intent on minerals deal
item.description: Officials say memo was signed ‘virtually’ and hope to finalise a full economic accord by the end of next week

item.title: Yuval Noah Harari: Trump’s world of rival fortresses
item.description: In the US president’s vision of post-liberal global disorder the weak should always surrender to the strong, writes the historian, philosopher and author

item.title: Tariffs ignore the reality of global tech supply chains
item.description: Nvidia has become a symbol of the looming business nightmare unleashed by Donald Trump

item.title: Could Trump fire the Federal Reserve chair?
item.description: Ninety-year-old precedent known as Humphrey’s Executor is crucial guardrail protecting US central bank’s independence

item.title: China stops buying liquefied gas from US
item.description: Standstill shows how Sino-American trade war has spilled into energy sector

item.title: Few US CEOs bought the dip as tariffs rattled markets
item.description: Some insiders unloaded stock before Trump’s ‘liberation day’ announcement but many more were restricted from doing so

item.title: OpenAI and start-ups race to generate code and transform software industry
item.description: Artificial intelligence groups are releasing models for computer programming that are reshaping coding jobs

item.title: Tech industry fears Trump’s trade war will hamper US AI ‘dominance’
item.description: Tariffs and threat of new duties on chips and computing infrastructure could frustrate American ambitions to lead artificial intelligence race

item.title: Harvard balks at Trump administration’s demand for foreign students’ data
item.description: Move comes as US government escalates attacks on country’s universities

item.title: US climate philanthropies fear Trump blow from loss of tax-free status
item.description: Chilling effect on charitable organisations comes as need for funding rises amid Trump cuts
